Items.Title: Oversight - The Use of Biometric Identification Systems in New York City.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The Use of Biometric Identification Systems in New York City.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Technology

A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to prohibiting places or providers of public accommodation from using biometric recognition technology and protecting any biometric identifier information collected
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting places or providers of public accommodation from using biometric recognition technology and protecting any biometric identifier information collected.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting the use of facial recognition technology in residential buildings
Items.MatterName: Limiting the use of facial recognition technology in residential buildings.
